name: Unity Of Lasers
description:
Hi everyone!

this game was made as part of the brackeys 2021 game jam!

in the game you need to find the ammo boxes and get more lasers

the more lasers you get the stronger you are! ( stronger together)

together the lasers can defeat the entire world! 

but you need to start small...

have fun!

Made by AgentPotatoDev & ShidoPitzelDev
